title: (x) Gestair logo sans caps - customised H&FJ Gotham {Florian}
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100103064107im_/http:/typophile.com/files/gestair_6407.jpg)

This was the cleanest shot of this font I could find.

Any ideas?

Thanks  
CM
author: cobramist

comments.content: Is this a logo, or have you seen other text with this exact typeface?

Thanks for the response.

Yes I have seen other texts with this typeface. It seems to be popular in the airline industry especially.

Any help is appreciated.

Thanks  
CM

It is an airline logo. Some other text on the [Gestair website](http://web.archive.org/web/20100103064107/http:/www.gestair.com/) is set in [Gotham](http://web.archive.org/web/20100103064107/http:/www.typography.com/fonts/font_styles.php?productLineID=100008). The logo very likely started out as Gotham aswell: the G bar has been cut off, the R got roughhoused, and the whole thing looks a bit stretched.  
F
